content:
Given two pieces of text, summarize the difference between them.
Text 1:  Cloth masks are effective at preventing spread of the virus within a community.
Text 2: Cloth masks are not effective at preventing spread of the virus between individuals.

The primary difference between the two pieces of text lies in the context of the effectiveness of cloth masks. 

- Text 1 suggests that cloth masks are effective at preventing the spread of the virus at a community level, implying a broader public health benefit.
- Text 2, however, claims that cloth masks are not effective at preventing the spread of the virus between individuals, focusing on the direct, person-to-person transmission.

In summary, the first text emphasizes community-level effectiveness, while the second text questions individual-level effectiveness.
